news.title: EU-ALMPO Project Launched
news.summary: DM Lab leads technical development in new Horizon Europe project on labour market analysis.
news.content: The Data & Media Laboratory is proud to announce its role in the newly launched EU-ALMPO (European Labour Market Policy Observatory) project. As a technical partner, the lab will develop AI-powered tools for labour market analysis and policy recommendations.
news.author: Giannis Tzimas

news.title: Best Paper Award at IISA 2024
news.summary: Research on energy forecasting wins prestigious best paper award.
news.content: Dr. Michael Paraskevas and team received the Best Paper Award at the International Conference on Information, Intelligence, Systems and Applications (IISA 2024) for their work on deep learning-based energy demand forecasting.
news.author: Michael Paraskevas

news.title: AI in Education Workshop
news.summary: DM Lab hosts international workshop on AI applications in education.
news.content: The lab successfully hosted a two-day international workshop on 'AI Applications in Modern Education', bringing together researchers, educators, and industry professionals to discuss the future of educational technology.
news.author: Panagiotis Zervas
